snippet: Jeremy Denk conducted six of Bach’s seven keyboard concertos from the piano on Sunday with the Chamber Music Society of Lincoln Center.
abstract: Anthony Tommasini reviews concert of Bach works performed by Chamber Music Society of Lincoln Center, conducted by Jeremy Denk, at Alice Tully Hall.
lead_paragraph: Jeremy Denk conducted six of Bach’s seven keyboard concertos from the piano on Sunday with the Chamber Music Society of Lincoln Center.

headline.seo: Jeremy Denk and Chamber Music Society of Lincoln Center
headline.main: As Concertos Fly by, a Rollicking Bach Time Is Had by All
